title: A1278 820-3115-B no image
message:
Hello, I have an A1278 820-3115-B with no image (just a white  screen), and i got 0V in LCD_IG_PWR_EN (pin 1 on U900), with the LCD connected. I have tried with other LCD with the same result. The LCD connector seems to be ok.
L9004 not shorted and is 0.39 ohm
It works fine with an external LCD.
Can anyone help me?

title: A1278 820-3115-B no image
message:
Post diode mode to ground at  LCD_IG_PWR_EN.
Try changing U9000.

title: A1278 820-3115-B no image
message:
Hello,
Diodo reading on  LCD_IG_PWR_EN is 600mV. After replacing U9000 the results are the same.

title: A1278 820-3115-B no image
message:
Then you have a problem with the PCH.
Try PRAM reset 2-3 times, just in case.
